```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
```

## load the pups data

```{r}
pups_df = 
  read.csv("data/FAS_pups.csv", skip = 3, na = c("NA", ".", "")) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  filter(sex == 1) %>%
  select(-pd_ears) %>%
  mutate(pd_pivot_ge7 = pd_pivot >= 7)
```
